profile.summary: Recent: Built Interpreter, placing 1st at the RETURN OF THE AGENTS hackathon hosted by Afore Capital and AI Valley!
achievements: We (Josh Xie, Purav Patel, Janani Prasad, and I) built Interpreter, placing 1st at the RETURN OF THE AGENTS hackathon hosted by Afore Capital and AI Valley!
Thanks to my amazing Northeastern teammates, Alazer Manakelew, Subham K., and Allen Z., we were able to create Web Brain and placed 3rd/75 teams!
Last night, we (Aritra S., Wei Tu, and I) had lots of fun replacing Santa's Job with AI, placing 1st at Santa's Ho's HackNight by Dedalus Labs at The Residency's Inventor's House i...
Within 24 hours we (Aritra S., Neil Tripathi, and I) built the Airbnb/Zillow for physical ads at Y Combinator HQ, placing top 6 in the Full Stack Hackathon hosted by Sim and Lovabl...
This time, we built ProductKit (productkit.liftgate.io) - placing finalist at the Hack FLUX: Beyond One Hackathon
This time, for the 2-day Google Gemini Hackathon, where we placed finalist with our project - Sports Clips

items: Y Combinator 2M followers Generality, Inc. (YC W25) is launching game-arena.ai: the largest LLM strategy game tournament to date. Games are great for measuring LLMs on instruction following, long-horizon planning, and problem-solving.
